import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./Data.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function RogiArmDashboard(){const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||"http://localhost:4000";// ÎÇ†Ïßú Î¶¨Ïä§Ìä∏ ÏÉÅÌÉú
const[list,setList]=useState([]);// ÏÑ†ÌÉùÎêú ÎÇ†Ïßú ÏÉÅÌÉú
const[selectedDate,setSelectedDate]=useState(null);// ÏÉâÍπîÎ≥Ñ ÏÉÅÏûê Í∞úÏàò ÏÉÅÌÉú
const[boxCounts,setBoxCounts]=useState({});// Ïª¥Ìè¨ÎÑåÌä∏ ÎßàÏö¥Ìä∏ Ïãú ÎÇ†Ïßú Î¶¨Ïä§Ìä∏ Î∂àÎü¨Ïò§Í∏∞
useEffect(()=>{fetch(`${API_URL}/list`).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setList(data));},[]);// ÎÇ†Ïßú ÌÅ¥Î¶≠ Ïãú Ìï¥Îãπ ÎÇ†ÏßúÏùò Î∞ïÏä§ Í∞úÏàò Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ Í∞ÄÏ†∏Ïò§Í∏∞
const handleClick=async date=>{setSelectedDate(date);try{const res=await fetch(`${API_URL}/stats/${date}`);const json=await res.json();setBoxCounts({red:json.red_boxes,green:json.green_boxes,blue:json.blue_boxes});}catch(err){setBoxCounts({});}};return(/*#__PURE__*/// ÎåÄÏãúÎ≥¥Îìú Ï†ÑÏ≤¥ Ïª®ÌÖåÏù¥ÎÑà
_jsx("div",{className:"dashboard-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("aside",{className:"dashboard-sidebar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"\uD83D\uDCC5 \uB0A0\uC9DC"}),list.map(item=>{// dummy- Ï†ëÎëêÏñ¥ Ï†úÍ±∞
const displayTime=item.time.startsWith("dummy-")?item.time.replace("dummy-",""):item.time;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"date-entry",onClick:()=>handleClick(item.file),children:displayTime},item.file);})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"dashboard-main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"panel large",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"\uD83C\uDFA5 \uC6B0\uB178 \uB3D9\uC601\uC0C1"}),selectedDate?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("video",{src:`${API_URL}/videos/${selectedDate}.mp4`,controls:true,width:"100%"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"video",children:"\uB0A0\uC9DC\uB97C \uC120\uD0DD\uD558\uC138\uC694."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-subpanels",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"panel small",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"\uD83D\uDCE6 \uC0C9\uAE54\uBCC4 \uC0C1\uC790 \uAC1C\uC218"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:Object.entries(boxCounts).map(_ref=>{let[color,count]=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[color,": ",count,"\uAC1C"]},color);})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"panel small"})]})]})]})}));}
